amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. 508. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for the Cape Wind Energy Project on the Outer Continental Shelf off Massachusetts, Nantucket Sound.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for the Cape Wind Energy Project on the Outer Continental Shelf off Massachusetts, Nantucket Sound.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weber (TX) amendment (A071) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A071) offered by Mr. Weber (TX).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Weber (TX) amendment (A071) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
